blogs.title: My New Website
blogs.body: Our new blog is finally live! Please look forward to more updates!
blogs.author: mario

blogs.title: Welcome Party
blogs.body: To celebrate the launch of our new blog, we will be chugging caviar in the break room this Friday at 6 PM.
blogs.author: yoshi

blogs.title: Web Dev Top Tips
blogs.body: Since we lost so many developers to caviar poisoning last Friday, I would like to step in with some quick dev tips to help you recent hires settle into your new roles.
blogs.author: mario
